EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1352235966.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1352235966.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Shyam, Thank you for your follow up! I look forward to speaking with you. I didn’t see that you scheduled any time on my calendar for yesterday and I apologize for not reaching out, I was digging through emails all day yesterday. When we speak I will be able to answer all of your questions below as they are all centered around our expense policies. By clicking on this link: http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html> and then opening the expense policy on the page, it will give you some insight as to how the expense deductions work. I will explain in more detail when we speak. Please schedule some time on my calendar by clicking here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlAtEpluazJcon0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. Thank you! Nicolette From: Shyam Sundar [mailto:shyams2000@yahoo.com] Sent: Thursday, November 01, 2012 11:56 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Follow Up Hi Nicolette, Thank you for your email introduction. I will check your calendar and setup a time to discuss some expense reimbursement policies of MBO. Meanwhile, thought of sending along some of my questions in my mind, that will help us to have a productive discussion during our phone call. 1. Expense reimbursement limits are based on Gross Payroll amount? or Gross Nett Payroll amount? (Nett: After all taxes are deducted) 2. What is the Minimum gross payroll amount for the year 2013?3. Based on a $36,000 gross payroll, for the State of MA, What will be the Employer taxes component? can we assume a percentage of the Gross yearly income? What is the percentage?4. Expenses amounts reimbursed during the year, are they reflected on the W2?5. What is the percentage of Expenses reimbursement related to the Gross YTD payroll amounts? Please forward me any documentation related to Expenses, that will provide some of the answers to my questions. Looking forward to speaking with you on Monday 12/5/12. Wish you a great Weekend. Thanks and regards,Shyam508-878-1527 From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> To: "shyams2000@yahoo.com <mailto:shyams2000@yahoo.com>" <shyams2000@yahoo.com <mailto:shyams2000@yahoo.com>> Sent: Wednesday, October 31, 2012 12:59 PM Subject: MBO Partners Follow Up Hi Shyam, My name is Nicolette Taylor, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Allison Peterson whom I believe you worked with when you were last active with MBO Partners. I work with all returning alumni that are going to be working with new clients so I wanted to introduce myself and set up a convenient time for us to speak briefly about your upcoming engagement and next steps to get you reactivated with MBO. You may schedule a time with me by using my online calendar <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlAtEpluazJcon0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> or let me know a few times that you are available this afternoon or tomorrow morning for us to speak. I will be out of the office starting at 12:00 PM EST tomorrow and all of Friday but will return Monday. I look forward to speaking with you please let me know if you have any questions or cannot find a time on my schedule that works for you. Thank you! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&bbentley@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlAtEpluazJcon0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlAtEpluazJcon0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlAtEpluazJcon0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
